TopicTitle: Reusable rocket SSTO to Gilly and back - KSP Stock

Articles.Content:
Hi,

This a super submission for a discord challenge : send a reusable rocket SSTO without wings, airbreathing engines, or EVA pack to a destination and back.
And Jeb choosed to go to Gilly !

As Jeb was disallowed to use his EVA pack, Kraken drives, or any mass drivers in any kinda of form, he resolved using a more traditionnal craft, instead of the tradionnal 3 parts rocket, usually used for such a destination...
With uses of gravity assists, that thing could go anywhere really, Jool, Eeloo...
Cheers !

Edited June 26, 2023 by kurgut
